analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x4178b60fd27dda312cc6e4232d063503c3f99040.sol:
	Contract HashcoCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x4178b60fd27dda312cc6e4232d063503c3f99040.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
